name: Scramble_Thoughts
display_help: Painfully scrambles the synapses of a targeted foe, leaving them dramatically Disoriented for a short duration. The effects of this power can jump from one foe to another in a chain dealing damage and applying a random mental effects to each target.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.
